text:
Abhyuday Bhai jab pehli baar facebook pai baat chalu hui thi uss waqt kabhi ni socha tha itna lamba safar sath mai chalenge. Tum ni hote to kitni jagah na jane kitni baar akele marwa chuka hota. Abhi bhi yaad hai kaise sath mai dono CS201 ki quiz se leke TA ki attendace se leke CS330 mai marwaye hai. Mera class ni jana and tera maje lena ki aj Quiz hogya(jo kafi time sach tha), phir raat ko jante hue ki canteen ni aega...tera aana puchne and chalne k liye kehna was all the quality that I assume only one of the best friends can do for someone. Mere nazar mai koi mujhse puche to bhai you are like Dhoni to me(as I always said to you), Teri Kismat ki hawa kabhi naram garam hote hue dheka hai maine and seeing you not loosing hope till end (2nd year k summer intern k liye apply jab kr rhe the khaas krke) and last ball mai 6 marna, tumse sikha hai maine. 

Wo Diwali mai harr baar Mall jana and McD mai khana and raat mai Munna bhai dhekna are few of the Gems memories of IITK(Bhai McD mai kha k bhi KFC mai ni khane ka kabhi afsos ni hua tere sath). Kya pata kitni baar tumne maari hai aur hum dono kitna argue and ladai kiye ho(yaad hai C411 ki apni ladai), but You always stood together and defended, kitna baar mere fucked up life se bachaya hai tumne can't be counted. Perfect combination of chapuness and harami panti ho tum but bhai dil k sabse saaf insaan ho. Jab mera kuch problem chal rha tha tum raat bhar sath mai jaga Assignment k liye and harr assignment mai support kiya, tere support k bina mai waqqt pai graduate tak ni hota(ML aur OS k assignment se leke personal life advice tak sath tha tum). Teri advice are like orders for me as I know they are coming out of you with multitude of SWOT analysis XD ,You were one of the friend like elder brother to me on whom I could have relied on blindly in the worst of my times(Although kabhi kabhi ullu bhi bana dete the to thora filter krna parta tha XD). 

One thing that I'm sure of is kitno se kitna din connected rahun, you are among few of the person jisse mai I know definitely connected rhunga, and you will be my first roll on calling someone whenever I land in Delhi. Baki formality to hogyi bhai aur kitni batein likhun tere sath to mera college ka significant percent beeta hai tereko pata hi hai...aja call pai baat krte hai aage ;P.
author: Deepesh Kumar Lall

text:
How "abey tum mereko janta ni hai be"(Hard tone) to "Bhai" in these 4 years changed was a miracle. Bhai you are one the most talented person jisse hardwork and consistency ki definition seekhi hai maine. You are living ideal for me and I see you not as a friend but as BROTHER and bahot gadar chapoge aage I know it.

 Baki lamba para likhenge ni I know aage bahot baatein hongi and Bahot jagah help aur krna parega tujhe mereko but bhai tum ni hota to bahot kuch ni sikhta mai. Wo CS202 ki assignment yaad hai, Pura tumne bna diya tha XD and maine jab pehli baar tera code dheka meri to usme hi phatt gyi thi. Although tumne mera aur bhi bahot sara assignmnent banaya hai ML se leke CS251 tk and bahot kuch seekhne mila hai tumse and you always taught and helped me like a family. Memories from `first year mai laptop tere room se leke bhaag jana, Teri jo phati thi bhai maza agya tha` to `watching dictator together and high ho k flat hojana` are few of the things jo iss memoir mai likhna possible ni. Jald hi milte hai Ranchi aaye to aur kuch logo se milna hai (IFYWIM) ;P
author: Deepesh Kumar Lall

text:
Nipun Bhai Tere sath itni saari dosti ki wo yaadein juri hai ki gina mushkil hai. Zakir khan kehta hai na wo dost jo dil tutne pai kehte hai chal do peg lagate hai -- wo tu hai mere liye bas difference ye hai ki peg ka saman sb tu lata tha. Midsem k late night se early morning tk jagne wala partner tha bhai tum, and wo late night thakan mai sutta ki alg alg brand se introduce krwana and library k neeche rm side tk jaake phukna and uske baad phir tute dil ki dastan se ... ek ladki ko dheka to aesa laga tak ka safar mai sath nibhaya hai tune. Jab bhi sutta, hukka ya daru ki jaroort parti thi you were my first response in last 4 years(saale bigar diye the tum mereko, shukraguzar hai tere XD). Wo sath mai Shivam ka lena XD aur Tera drams wali crush ka story sunne mai kya maza ata tha bhai. Although meri suggestions tujhe uss waqt mushkil lagti thi but aaj tu agree krega!

I still remember the first time 2nd year mai jab mai tujhe gym mai bata rha tha ye karo and wo uthao (;P)se, how it changed to you teaching me "Ohh behen k la*de roj subh chana khaunga tu bhi khya kr aur subh gym chal mere sath". Aur Kehte na bhai nashe mai kahi hui baat dil ki hoti hai....maine jitne nashe kiye tere sath itna samjh gya tu dil ka bahot saaf banda hai. Bandi ko teri dhek ke although bahot buri wali phatt ti hai and teri kismat kharab hai but uske peeche bhi ek bahot shareef bhola wajah rheta hai. Although marks dhek k jo teri phatt ti hai uspe ni comment krunga mai ;P(Just kidding). Tere se jo mangu wo apna sa lagta tha bhai chaye wo late night sutta ka naya brand ho ya teri cycle ;P itna apna ki mai lautana hi bhul jata ;P. Aur Library mai tera harr midsem kehna ki Iss baar Drams club chordunga se endsem tk drams club mai wapas ghus jana was something that mere hote college mai to ni hi ho paya. Bhai khane k mamle mai to dono ka taste kitna match kiya hai! like exam k waqt late night aake jo sath mai daba k kahte the dono canteen mai and wo sath mai Kathi role and wazwan k paas chicken khana jab koi aur ni chalte the and sath mai pehli baar hukka marna ;P. Aese kitni yaadein hai bhai jo iss memoir mai likh k ni keh paunga but You are one the friends jo family sa feel krwayi campus mai.

I know bhai aage khoob chapoge and jaldi graduate ho phir milte hai, iss baar uss level wali party hogi jaisa mai tere room aya tha hali mai subh aur tu utha k mereko room legya tha XD. Insta pai to meme share krte hi hai aja uspe :D.
author: Deepesh Kumar Lall

text:
Parth Bhai tere liye bhale bahot SAE wale senior ho, mere liye aap hi SAE wale senior the jinhone Car ka engine ka working se leke SAE k workshop tk mai entry karwayi thi. 1st year mai jab pehli baar mile the tumse dhek ke laga tha sabse bhole ho but Jab pehli baar P@rth@***i wala scam hua tb samjha ni ye sabse tedhi cheej hai. But ussi year bhai tumne mera NSS mai mere badle jaake report submit krke ye bhi sabit krdiya tha ki tum devmanus ho(Iski kitni bhi treat dedun I agree wo kum hi hai). 

Tumhare advices although humesa sabse chalu rhe hai but wo sbse effective bhi the. And wo raat mai jab tum canteen mai apne jee waale room mate ka jaise maare the...literally meri phatt gyi thi bhai uss waqqt laga the sakshat Sardar khan jaise kehta hai ki keh k lunga wala scene chal rha tha. Harr break k baad bhai tum 10 tarah ki khane ki cheej laate the, never thought tum iss baar jaoge to wapas jaldi mulakat ni ho paegi, Koi dikat ni milenge wapas tb pizza waise hi mangwaya jaega sath mai. 

Sabse sahi wali memories wo thi jisme tumne chipkali ki maari thi, mujhe literally laga tha tu uska wahi asthi saja dega XD and harr summer cooler repair krdena hum log ka bahot mehnat bach jata tha bhai chapu to tum the bahot pehle se. And ofcousre Teri cycle to sabse best lagti thi mujhe In my opinion one of the reason Maine naya cycle ni liya was tumhari cycle kuch jyada hi achi thi ;P. GTA5 se leke Netflix tak ka jugad lagwate the bhai tum na jaane kitne sari cheejein torrent karwayi hai tumse XD. Corona kaal k baad milte hai bhai aur bakchodi pelenge.
author: Deepesh Kumar Lall
